attributes.action: Fix the temperature on the Victoria Line!
attributes.additional_details:
I want TFL to investigate this properly instead of dismissing complaints and tweets about the issue.

A member of staff needs to ride the full line, multiple times a day and experience the heat first hand.
In the morning, rush hour and night tube.

We shouldn't have to suffer tropical temperatures, especially in the wake of a pandemic. Think of how many germs are breeding down there.
It's disgusting and uncomfortable for the monthly price we fork out, not all of us can use an alternative route.
attributes.background:
Since the heatwave, the Victoria Line has not cooled back down. The heat is insufferable and nauseating. 

We shouldn't have to start and end our commute feeling sick. 
It was never this uncomfortable to use in the past.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of Transport for London, the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
